Dm_RT_0035_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>There's not a Rito alive capable of
crossing this stormy sky and making it
all the way there.<sp:0:4:0>Well. Except for one.
Dm_RT_0035_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Painful_00>Aw! <sp:5:0:0>You saw that, Harth?! Talk about
embarrassing.
Dm_RT_0035_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Only you have the skill and training to
<clr:0000>create gusts at will<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>"Tulin will be the finest Rito warrior of all
once he understands the value of working
with his allies."
<snd:Happy_00>You know who said that to me? Your old
dad, Teba.
Dm_RT_0035_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I bet now you see why we were treating
you like a small chick.
Dm_RT_0035_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Yeah.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>You were rightâ€”it really is important to
work as a flock.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I think I finally get what Dad has been
trying to tell me all this time.
Dm_RT_0035_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Think_01>Is that all there is to the story?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It seems unlike you to let your bow be
taken, Tulin.
Dm_RT_0035_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yep. And I'll make sure he knows what
you accomplished here today.<sp:0:4:0>Now it's time you go with Link to <clr:0000>find
Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>whatever's causing
this blizzard<clr:ffff>!
Dm_RT_0035_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, look. I think this might have been
a hideout for those monsters.
Dm_RT_0035_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh, yeah, funny story about that! There
was this whole thing with <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Dm_RT_0035_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:TalkPositive_00>No problem. The two of us together have
got this!
Dm_RT_0035_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>I spotted her getting attacked by a
monster. It was such a surprise that I
dropped my guard and it stole my bow.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0601>But I guess she was fine, because then
she zoomed up <clr:0000>above that cloud<clr:ffff>.
Dm_RT_0035_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionAngry_00>What? <clr:0000>Princess Zelda flew above the
cloud?!<clr:ffff> How can that be?
Dm_RT_0035_28_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Determination_00>I saw Princess Zelda up on the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>
near Hebra Peak. <sp:5:1:0>Let's check there first.
Dm_RT_0035_05:
It couldn't have been! There's no way.
Must've been something else!
Dm_RT_0035_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmm... Seems like a stretch, but we're
not going to get to the bottom of it sitting
around here.
Dm_RT_0035_11_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I...<sp:5:0:0>didn't listen when Gesane tried to
stop me. I thought I could handle it.<sp:0:4:0>But I just ended up losing my favorite
bow to those stupid things.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>I thought I was fully-fledged, but there's
probably no way I could've gotten it back
on my own.
Dm_RT_0035_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Tulin, Link came out here looking for
Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0>You should go with him, and <clr:0000>investigate
the cloud <clr:ffff>you say the princess
soared into.
Dm_RT_0035_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>That was some impressive teamwork,
you two!
Dm_RT_0035_20: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Painful_00>Huh?! But I thought I wasn't allowed.
Dm_RT_0035_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive_00>I got a report before coming here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We think it's likely that the blizzard is
coming from inside that cloud after all.
Dm_RT_0035_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_00>I want to see for myself as soon as I can,
but the strong winds make any <clr:0000>approach
from the sides impossible<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The only way in is <clr:0000>through the top<clr:ffff>, but...
